Job Title: Mechanical Engineer – Embrace a Hybrid Work Schedule

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Mechanical Engineer – Embrace a Hybrid Work Schedule**

Are you a seasoned Mechanical Engineer with a passion for tackling complex technical challenges and driving innovation in energy solutions? Our client, an industry-leading professional and technical services firm with over 25 years of experience and more than 5000 projects completed, is seeking a motivated individual to join their team in Manhattan and Troy, NY. With notable clients like Delta Airlines and Forbes, and projects spanning across 25 states and the Caribbean, you’ll have the opportunity to work on diverse and impactful projects while enjoying a hybrid work schedule that offers flexibility and work-life balance.

Benefits:**

– Hybrid work schedule to support a healthy work-life balance

– Engage with prestigious clients like Delta Airlines, Forbes, Honeywell, and Pfizer, contributing to your professional growth and network

– Join a team of experts with over 30 years of experience, providing mentorship and opportunities for continuous learning and development

Responsibilities:**

– Contribute to cutting-edge mechanical design projects, including energy audits, system sizing, and technical specifications, making a tangible impact on sustainable energy solutions

– Collaborate with cross-disciplinary colleagues to deliver comprehensive mechanical system designs, fostering a team-oriented and innovative work environment

– Conduct field audits and research to ensure compliance with building codes, energy regulations, and industry standards, offering you a holistic understanding of project requirements

Requirements:**

– Demonstrate 5-7 years of experience in US-based mechanical engineering projects, showcasing your expertise and adaptability in various project settings

– Proficient in Microsoft Office and AutoCAD for technical drafting, highlighting your technical skills and attention to detail

– Possess a Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering or related field, with a PE License in New York State and/or CEM certification as a plus, providing you with opportunities for professional growth and advancement

Do you have any disability or condition that could affect you in the application and interview process? Please feel free to share this information as part of your application, including any necessary adjustments you might need, so we can help make the process easier for you. We assure you this information will not have any negative effect on the interview process outcome.

About NonStop: We are NonStop, a leading provider of staffing solutions throughout Europe and now also in the US. We’re passionate about connecting talent with opportunity and work non-stop to support our clients in hiring the best talent for their teams. Feel free to pop over to our website, NonStop Consulting ([NonStop Consulting](https://www.nonstopconsulting.com)), for more information, to browse all our roles, or to let us know how we can help you.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
